    • noLayout

      public HttpSupport.RenderBuilder noLayout()
      Call this method to turn off all layouts. The view will be rendered raw - no layouts.
      Returns:
      instance of RenderBuilder

    • format

      public HttpSupport.RenderBuilder format​(String format)
      Sets a format for the current request. This is a intermediate extension for the template file. For instance, if the name of template file is document.xml.ftl, then the "xml" part is set with this method, the "document" is a template name, and "ftl" extension is assumed in case you use FreeMarker template manager.
      Parameters:
      format - template format
      Returns:
      instance of RenderBuilder
